compliant.section:
台灣大車隊股份有限公司為提供會員服務並保護消費者權益，乃建立會員機制，以提供完整之會員服務，謹依個人資料保護法第8條規定向當事人蒐集個人資料時，應明確告知當事人下列事項：
 一、蒐集之目的。
compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall, at the time of obtaining personal data, inform the data subject of the following: (a) the purposes for which the personal data are intended to be used;

non_compliant.section:
台灣大車隊股份有限公司為提供會員服務並保護消費者權益，乃建立會員機制，以提供完整之會員服務，謹依個人資料保護法第8條規定向當事人蒐集個人資料時，應明確告知當事人下列事項：
 一、蒐集之目的。
non_compliant.legal provisions: The controller shall, at the time of obtaining personal data, inform the data subject of the following: (b) the recipients or categories of recipients to whom the personal data might be disclosed; (c) the existence of the right of access to personal data concerning him or her, and to rectification or erasure of such data, or restriction of processing, or to object to processing, as well as the right to data portability; (d) where the personal data are not collected from the data subject, any available information as to their source; (e) the existence of automated decision-making, including profiling, referred to in Article 22(1) and (4) and, at least in those cases, meaningful information about the logic involved, as well as the significance and envisaged consequences of such processing for the data subject; (f) the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority; (g) if the provision of personal data is a statutory or contractual requirement, or a requirement necessary to enter into a contract, and whether the data subject is obliged to provide the personal data and the possible consequences of failure to provide such data; (h) the existence of any intended transfers of personal data to a third country or to an international organisation, and the level of protection afforded to personal data in that country or by that international organisation.
non_compliant.amend: The company should inform the data subject about the recipients or categories of recipients to whom the personal data might be disclosed, the existence of the right of access to personal data concerning him or her, and to rectification or erasure of such data, or restriction of processing, or to object to processing, as well as the right to data portability, any available information as to their source, the existence of automated decision-making, including profiling, the right to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority, if the provision of personal data is a statutory or contractual requirement, or a requirement necessary to enter into a contract, and whether the data subject is obliged to provide the personal data and the possible consequences of failure to provide such data, the existence of any intended transfers of personal data to a third country or to an international organisation, and the level of protection afforded to personal data in that country or by that international organisation.
